Shortcut for making the status sidebar

Source: R/helpers.R
dot-makeSidebar.Rd

Shortcut for making the status sidebar

.makeSidebar(status, key, pwfCols, usePlotly = TRUE)

Arguments

status

A data.frame with columns 'Filename' & 'Status'

key

A vector of values corresponding to the Filename column

pwfCols

An object of class PwfCols

usePlotly

If TRUE, output is a plotly panel

Value

if usePlotly = TRUE, a plotly object. The sidebar for an interactive plot showing PASS/WARN/FAIL status for each file. If usePlotly = FALSE the underlying ggplot object will be returned.
